com.thinkaurelius.titan.core

Interface TitanProperty

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<TitanElement>, com.tinkerpop.blueprints.Element, com.thinkaurelius.titan.util.datastructures.Removable, TitanElement, TitanRelation

    public interface TitanProperty
extends TitanRelation
    TitanProperty is a TitanRelation connecting a vertex to an attribute value. TitanProperty extends TitanRelation, with methods for retrieving the property's attribute and key.
    Author:
    Matthias Bröcheler (me@matthiasb.com);
    See Also:
    TitanRelation, TitanKey

    • Property Summary

      • getValue

        <O> O getValue(Class<O> clazz)
        Returns the attribute value of this property cast to the specified class.
        Type Parameters:
        O - Class to cast the attribute to
        Parameters:
        clazz - Class to cast the attribute to
        Returns:
        Attribute of this property cast to the specified class.
        Throws:
        ClassCastException - if the attribute cannot be cast to clazz.
